    • getCajaswithEmpleados

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<com.TeamPro.Model.CajaWithEmp> getCajaswithEmpleados() throws java.sql.SQLException
      This method executes the following query:

      SELECT caja.id, usuarios.nombre, caja.saldo_caja FROM caja INNER JOIN usuarios ON caja.id_u = usuarios.id WHERE caja.id = <id>;

      Parameters:
      id - id of the caja
      Returns:
      list of query
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • getTotalSales

      public double getTotalSales​(int usuario_id) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Get the total sales in money of an employee (cajero) This method executes the following query:

      SELECT SUM(productos.precio * ventas.cantidad) FROM ventas JOIN productos ON ventas.id_p = productos.id WHERE ventas.id_u = <usuario_id>

      Returns:
      the sum of product * cantidad for each sale of the employee
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • getVentaswithEmpleados

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<com.TeamPro.Model.VentaWithProducto> getVentaswithEmpleados​(int usuario_id) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Get the list of sales of an employee (cajero) to display in the GUI This method executes the following query:

      SELECT * FROM ventas JOIN productos ON ventas.id_p = productos.id WHERE ventas.id_u = 4 ORDER BY ventas.id;

      Parameters:
      usuario_id - id of the employee
      Returns:
      the list of sales of the employee
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • actualizarStock

      public void actualizarStock​(javafx.collections.ObservableList<com.TeamPro.Model.ProductoFX> vendidos) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Actualiza el stock de los productos vendidos

      Throws:
